text: Automotive Holdings Group Limited () is an Australian company specialising in automotive retail and logistics. It was established in 1952. AHG is listed on the S&P;/ASX 200. As of February 2017, its largest shareholder was Nick Politis, who held a 22.8% stake through his AP Eagers Ltd. John McConnell became managing director of AHG in 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Companies listed on the Australian Securities Exchange Category:Automotive companies of Australia Category:Transport companies established in 1952
title: Automotive Holdings Group
